item.title: hello there
item.description: My name is Jason, nice to meet you! I started my product management career at Vodafone building M-PESA in multiple African markets. The service created a new business model for mobile operators. Afterwards, I moved to Skrill / Paysafe and learnt about marketplaces, card and alternative payments, CRMs and leading agile teams. I enjoyed working with our international teams in Bulgaria and Canada. I had an exciting year as Head of Product with the M-KOPA Solar teams in UK and Nairobi, Kenya.

item.title: 5 steps to plan your launch
item.description: You can only launch once, so do it right With PalmPay live in Nigeria and Ghana live and 4 more African markets inflight, here are some lessons from my experience over the last 2 years. 1. Do your research I know this might appear obvious, but understanding the market landscape before you start gives you the power to make better long term decisions. Spending time early on to get this right will direct your strategy and give your project plan a strong foundation.

item.title: Hiring the best remotely: a checklist
item.description: There is so much talent out there, you just need to find it I’ve worked with remote teams across Africa, Europe, America and Asia and have been hiring remote product teams over the last 3 years. Here are is a checklist to help Know what you want (aka write the perfect JD) You are the hiring manager! It is your role to shape the macro and micro aspects of the role.

item.title: Running remote teams
item.description: The new normal is here - run your remote team well and continue to build excellent products With experience managing remote teams over the last 5 years, here are my cheat notes to ensure you remain productive whilst still having team harmony. Build your business rhythm We are all creatures of habit. Building habits into your team helps with productivity and alignment. Your team will know where to be and what to expect from the important meetings week in and out.
